languages.text: "От лица своей семьи я нижайше прошу простить нам наше небрежение и готова принять любое наказание".

traits.locale_text: "От лица своей семьи я нижайше прошу простить нам наше небрежение и готова принять любое наказание".

languages.text: "On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence. I am ready to accept any punishment."
languages.original_text: "От лица своей семьи я нижайше прошу простить нам наше небрежение и готова принять любое наказание".

traits.locale_text: "On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence and am ready to accept any punishment."
"On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence and am ready to accept any punishment."
"On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence. I am ready to accept any punishment."
"On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence. I am ready to accept any punishment."
"On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence. I am ready to accept any punishment."

languages.text: 「一族を代表して、我らの怠慢を心よりお詫びいたします。いかなる罰でも承ります」
languages.original_text: "On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence. I am ready to accept any punishment."

traits.locale_text: 「一族を代表して、我らの怠慢を心よりお詫びいたします。いかなる罰でも承ります」

languages.text: “我代表我的家族，恳请您原谅我们的疏忽。我愿意接受任何惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence. I am ready to accept any punishment."

traits.locale_text: “我代表我的家族，恳请您原谅我们的疏忽。我愿意接受任何惩罚。”

languages.text: «En nombre de mi familia, le ruego que absuelva nuestra negligencia. Estoy lista para aceptar cualquier castigo».
languages.original_text: "On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence. I am ready to accept any punishment."

traits.locale_text: «En nombre de mi familia, le ruego que absuelva nuestra negligencia. Estoy lista para aceptar cualquier castigo».

languages.text: « Au nom de ma famille, je vous prie de bien vouloir pardonner notre négligence. Je suis prête à accepter tout châtiment que vous estimerez approprié. »
languages.original_text: "On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence. I am ready to accept any punishment."

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de ma famille, je vous prie de bien vouloir pardonner notre négligence. Je suis prête à accepter tout châtiment que vous estimerez approprié. »

languages.text: "Im Namen meiner Familie bitte ich um Vergebung für unsere Nachlässigkeit. Ich bin bereit, jedwede Strafe zu akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence. I am ready to accept any punishment."

traits.locale_text: "Im Namen meiner Familie bitte ich um Vergebung für unsere Nachlässigkeit. Ich bin bereit, jedwede Strafe zu akzeptieren."

languages.text: "Kurban olayım, yalvarırım ailemin ihmalkârlığını mazur görün. Her türlü cezaya razıyım."
languages.original_text: "On behalf of my family, I humbly beg you to forgive our negligence. I am ready to accept any punishment."

traits.locale_text: "Kurban olayım, yalvarırım ailemin ihmalkârlığını mazur görün. Her türlü cezaya razıyım."
